name: Chapter 9: The Setback
short_description: A critical part of the re-coding project fails due to sabotage by the rogue Codarians. Captain Picard and his team scramble to find a solution, while maintaining the shaky alliance with the main Codarian faction.
to_next_chapter: The team devises a contingency plan to work around the sabotage, determined to prevent the disaster at all costs.
